law.catch_line: Name for program created by KRS 158.798.
law.text: The Kentucky Science and Technology Council, Inc., shall, in cooperation with the Department for Education and the Council on Postsecondary Education, develop and conduct a competition among Kentucky middle and high school students for the purpose of choosing a Kentuckian of national or international acclaim as a scientist, mathematician, or engineer for whom the programs developed under KRS 158.798 shall be named.
law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 63, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992.
